title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 101.6 - Confidentiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 101.6 - Confidentiality

State Regulations

Except as set forth in section
101.7
of this Part, requests for
advisory opinions, advisory opinions issued by the committee, and the facts and
circumstances on which they are based shall be confidential and shall not be
disclosed by the committee to any person other than the individual making the
request. Deliberations by the committee shall be
confidential. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
101.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
